chara.textHome: Oh, you're here too?
It's hot, I'm sweating...
My mood is merda.
Please, don't talk to me.
Oh... Ugh!
Cicadas...
So noisy, I can't stand them!

Who opened the window
this early anyway?!
No one told me it was going to be THIS hot.

Someone needs to create
an air conditioner for the earth.
Ah, perfetto...
I was waiting for my hotdog to arrive.
Let's eat.
I really don't care about seafood, though...
*Munch*
Molto delizioso.

Summer is so full of life,
all 24 hours of every day.

The sky is overflowing with stars, it's hot,
and the insects are constantly singing.
In short, for me, Alina, it is terribile.
Mi dispiace, I'm not in a good mood today.
It's too hot...
You might want to leave me alone for now.

Not only is my mood merda,
this Witch's timing is the same.
I could take it out, I could make it my pet.
Let's just have a little bit of fun.
*Giggle*

You know, Endless Mirrors
may be similar to the sea.

It's deep, full of mysteries, a place where
Familiars are both born and killed.

Huh? I was tired so I decided to
wind down with a bit of reading.

If I don't read this draft before
vacation's over, the idiota will get
even more annoying.
Hmm...
On second thought, I don't mind the beach.

Everyone in their swimsuits,
showing off their perfect bodies...
A good chance to hunt for new specimens.
Hey, who hit me with this beachball?
I'm trying to sketch here.
Go play over there.
Making a sandcastle?
All too easy for me.

If you really want to see me make one,
I guess I could create something...
It's going to cost you, though.
My most favorite summer event?
Well the Bon Festival, of course.
So emozionante, it makes my heart flutter.

Stai zitto!
I'm trying to work here.

I have the most perfect idea...
I need to get it down.

I'm even using my sweat
to blend the paints.
I forgot to buy souvenirs...

That idiota is really going to give it
to me if I don't get her something.
She knew I was going to the beach, too.
Hmm, it's odd...

Just coming to the beach with
another person is so fresh.

I usually don't think much of people,
especially the ones I have
no relationship with.
I tried putting everyone into this drawing.
You can have it if you want.
You can throw it away if you don't.
